Text: Anyone know, is the the original album or the special gold edition?

NO! This is a set of many sources tracks. I have original CDs: 
-DT (1st release 14 Tracks)
-DT (Limited Edt CD1 14 Tracks *CD2 1  Track)
-DT (Special Gold Edt CD1 27 Tracks **CD2 3  Track3)
-DT (Remastered 27 Tracks)

*CD2 1 Track: Die Weihnachtsgeschichte
**CD2 3 tracks: Die Weihnachtsgeschichte,Der Lobgesang and Quia Respexit aus Maginificat von Johann Sebastian Bach
